sentences.en: A " vegetative propagule " is any type of vegetatively propagated tree.
sentences.cn: “ 营养繁殖体 ” 是无性繁殖树木的任何类型.

sentences.en: Efficient methods of vegetative propagation and improved screening techniques are also required.
sentences.cn: 高效率的无性繁殖法和改良的鉴定技术也属必需.

sentences.en: It is widely distributed throughout the body and controls the so - called automatic, or vegetative, functions.
sentences.cn: 它遍布全身,控制着通称为自主性或营养性功能.

sentences.en: Many trees can be propagated from vegetative shoots, thus reproducing their genotypes exactly.
sentences.cn: 许多树木能够利用营养枝繁殖, 这样,它们的基因型可以精确地传衍.

sentences.en: She had been in what doctors described as an irreversible vegetative state for five years.
sentences.cn: 她处于医生所说的不可逆性植物人状态已经5年了。

sentences.en: She was in what was described as a vegetative state.
sentences.cn: 她处于一种被称为植物人的状态。

sentences.en: Some cultivars also form fruit buds on the tips of the current season's vegetative shoots.
sentences.cn: 一些栽培品种也在当年的生长枝的顶端形成花芽.

sentences.en: Such rootstocks or cultivars were reproduced true to type by vegetative propagation.
sentences.cn: 这些钻木和品种,通过无性繁殖长成和亲本一样的类型.

sentences.en: The autonomic nervous system is also called the visceral, vegetative, or involuntary nervous system.
sentences.cn: 自主神经系统又称内脏神经系统, 营养神经系统或不随意神经系统.

sentences.en: The avocado shows a typical loss of green color and a reduction in vegetative growth.
sentences.cn: 鳄梨呈现典型的叶色褪绿及营养生长减弱.

sentences.en: The harshness of the climate makes vegetative growth extremely slow.
sentences.cn: 恶劣的气候使植物生长特别缓慢。

sentences.en: The new plant forms new bulbs in vegetative reproduction.
sentences.cn: 增殖性繁殖新株长成新鳞茎.

sentences.en: The nuclei, located in the vegetative cells, each contain one set of seven chromosomes.
sentences.cn: 位于营养细胞中的每个核含有一套七条染色体.

sentences.en: The terminal bud continues vegetative activity during most of the growing season.
sentences.cn: 在大部分生长季节,这种茎的顶芽继续着植物的生长.

sentences.en: The unclei, located in the vegetative cells, each contain one set of seven chromosomes.
sentences.cn: 位于营养细胞中的每个核含有一套染色体,共7条.

words.tran_cn: 植物的，植物性的；生长的
植被；植物，草木；呆板单调的生活
生长；植物似地生长；茫茫然地过日子
植物的；植物人状态的，无所作为的；促使植物生长的；[生物]有生长力的

phrases.tran_cn: 持续性植物状态；植物状态
营养繁殖；植物无性繁殖

trans.tran_cn: 有关植物生长的，植物的，有生长力的，生活呆板单调
trans.tran_en: relating to plants, and particularly to the way they grow or make new plants
